00049 #define DEF_ADT_SMM(T, domain, size) \
00050 static T _ ## domain ## _mem_block[size]; \
00051 static T* _ ## domain ## _free_stack[size]; \
00052 static int _ ## domain ## _free_stack_top; \
00053 \
00054 void init ## domain ## s() \
00055 { \
00056 int i; \
00057 \
00058         _ ## domain ## _free_stack_top = 0; \
00059         for(i = size - 1; i >= 0; i--) { \
00060                 _ ## domain ## _free_stack[(_ ## domain ## _free_stack_top)++] = \
00061                         _ ## domain ## _mem_block + i; \
00062         } \
00063 } \
00064 \
00065 void free ## domain(T *m) { \
00066         _ ## domain ## _free_stack[(_ ## domain ## _free_stack_top)++] = m; \
00067 } \
00068 \
00069 T* alloc ## domain() \
00070 { \
00071 T *m; \
00072 \
00073         if(!(_ ## domain ## _free_stack_top)) \
00074                 return 0; \
00075 \
00076         m = _ ## domain ## _free_stack[--(_ ## domain ## _free_stack_top)]; \
00077         return m; \
00078 } \
00079 \
00080 int get  ## domain ## ID(const T *m) \
00081 { \
00082 const int id = (m - _ ## domain ## _mem_block); \
00083 \
00084         if(id < 0 || id >= size) \
00085                 return -1; \
00086 \
00087         return id; \
00088 }

00109 #define DEF_ADT_QUEUE(T, domain, field_next, field_prev) \
00110 T* mkEmpty ## domain ## Q () { \
00111         return NULL; \
00112 } \
00113 \
00114 int empty ## domain ## Q (const T *q) { \
00115         return (q == NULL); \
00116 } \
00117 \
00118 void insert ## domain (T **q, T *v) { \
00119         if(*q) { \
00120                 /* Are there any element in the queue? */ \
00121                 v -> field_next = (*q) -> field_next; \
00122                 v -> field_next -> field_prev = v; \
00123                 v -> field_prev = *q; \
00124                 (*q) -> field_next = v; \
00125                 *q = v; \
00126         } \
00127         else { \
00128                 v -> field_prev = v -> field_next = v; \
00129                 *q = v; \
00130         } \
00131 } \
00132 \
00133 T* out ## domain (T **q, T *v) { \
00134         if(!q || !*q || !v) \
00135                 /* Queue is empty or invalid pointer */ \
00136                 return NULL; \
00137         \
00138         if((*q) -> field_next == *q) { \
00139                 /* Queue has a single element */ \
00140                 if(v != *q) \
00141                         return NULL; \
00142                 \
00143                 *q = NULL; \
00144                 v -> field_prev = v -> field_next = NULL; \
00145                 return v; \
00146         } \
00147         \
00148         if(!(v -> field_prev) || !(v -> field_next)) \
00149                 /* v has no prev or next field */ \
00150                 return NULL; \
00151         \
00152         v -> field_prev -> field_next = v -> field_next; \
00153         v -> field_next -> field_prev = v -> field_prev; \
00154         \
00155         if(v == *q) \
00156                 /* Is v the tail of the queue? */ \
00157                 *q = (*q) -> field_prev; \
00158         \
00159         v -> field_prev = v -> field_next = NULL; \
00160         return v; \
00161 } \
00162 \
00163 T* remove ## domain (T **q) { \
00164         return ((!q || !*q) ? NULL : out ## domain (q, (*q) -> field_next)); \
00165 } \
00166 \
00167 T* head ## domain (const T *q) { \
00168         if(!q) \
00169                 return NULL; \
00170         else \
00171                 return q -> field_next; \
00172 } \
00173 \
00174 T* search ## domain (const T *q, const T *v) \
00175 { \
00176 const T *it; \
00177 \
00178         if(!empty ## domain ## Q(q)) { \
00179                 it = q -> field_next; \
00180                 do { \
00181                         if(it == v) \
00182                                 return (T*)v; \
00183                         \
00184                         it = it -> field_next; \
00185                 } while(it != q -> field_next); \
00186         } \
00187         \
00188         return NULL; \
00189 }
